meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub with clusters of small flowers.
meanings.sent1: The dogwood in our garden blooms beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of dogwood flowers for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The dogwood tree seemed to be showing off its pretty flowers to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and delicate as a dogwood blossom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the dogwood flowers filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The hard, fine-grained wood of a dogwood tree.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa carved a beautiful bowl out of dogwood for the dining table.
meanings.sent2: The dogwood wood is known for its strength and durability.
meanings.sent3: The dogwood plank refused to be turned into a simple shelf, insisting on being a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as a piece of dogwood.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns in the dogwood wood were mesmerizing.
